scheduling.mode_tooltip: Cache-First: Vincular sess√£o √† conta, aguardar no limite de taxa (maximizar utilidade do cache); Balance: Vincular sess√£o, alternar conta no limite de taxa; Performance: Round-robin padr√£o.

modes_desc.CacheFirst: Vincula sess√£o √† conta, aguarda precisamente se limitado (Maximiza acertos de Prompt Cache).
modes_desc.Balance: Vincula sess√£o, alterna automaticamente para conta dispon√≠vel se limitado (Equilibra cache e disponibilidade).
modes_desc.PerformanceFirst: Sem vincula√ß√£o de sess√£o, rota√ß√£o round-robin pura (Melhor para alta concorr√™ncia).

example.title: Exemplos de Uso
example.python_anthropic:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic(
    # Recomendado: 127.0.0.1
    base_url="{{baseUrl}}",
    api_key="{{apiKey}}"
)

# Nota: Antigravity suporta chamar qualquer modelo via SDK Anthropic
response = client.messages.create(
    model="{{modelId}}",
    max_tokens=1024,
    messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "Hello"}]
)

print(response.content[0].text)
example.python_gemini:
# Instalar: pip install google-generativeai
import google.generativeai as genai

# Usar endere√ßo proxy Antigravity (recomendado 127.0.0.1)
genai.configure(
    api_key="{{apiKey}}",
    transport='rest',
    client_options={'api_endpoint': '{{rawBaseUrl}}'}
)

model = genai.GenerativeModel('{{modelId}}')
response = model.generate_content("Hello")
print(response.text)
example.python_openai_image:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    base_url="{{baseUrl}}",
    api_key="{{apiKey}}"
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="{{modelId}}",
    # Op√ß√£o 1: usar tamanho (recomendado)
    # Suportado: "1024x1024" (1:1), "1280x720" (16:9), "720x1280" (9:16), "1216x896" (4:3)
    extra_body={ "size": "1024x1024" },

    # Op√ß√£o 2: usar sufixo do modelo
    # ex: gemini-3-pro-image-16-9, gemini-3-pro-image-4-3
    # model="gemini-3-pro-image-16-9",
    messages=[{
        "role": "user",
        "content": "Desenhe uma cidade futurista"
    }]
)

print(response.choices[0].message.content)
example.python_openai:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI(
    base_url="{{baseUrl}}",
    api_key="{{apiKey}}"
)

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="{{modelId}}",
    messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "Hello"}]
)

print(response.choices[0].message.content)
